description:
Ashibe’s grandpa builds an ice rink for his company and all of Ashibe’s friends are there to skate.
Goma-chan is excited to skate for the first time, but gets frustrated when he can’t figure out how.
That is, until Ashibe’s ma shows up with ice pops...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃん オン アイス
